title: Prince Harry’s Bombshell: Meghan and I Would Love to Move to Africa
text:
If you love The Daily Beast’s royal coverage, then we hope you’ll enjoy The Royalist, a members-only series for Beast Inside. Become a member to get it in your inbox on Sunday.

Harry: Meghan and I would love to move to Africa

It’s an extraordinary morning of royal news in the U.K. today, with a welter of stories emerging from a film about Prince Harry and Meghan Markle’s African tour due to be screened later today (The Daily Beast will be watching, mouth agape, and bringing you an update on the site at around 5/6pm EST).
description: Harry and Meghan consider a move to South Africa, royal feud rumors resurface, Kate and William’s winning wardrobe in Pakistan, and do Meghan’s loved ones not ask her how she is?
